sqlMap.select: SELECT ADM.SysopId, ADM.grpCd, ADM.Pwd, ADM.SysopNm, ADM.Dept, ADM.Email, ADM.PhoneNo, ADM.MblNo, ADM.UseFl, ADM.RegId, to_char(ADM.RegDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RegDate1, ADM.UpdId, to_char(ADM.UpdDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UpdDate, COD.CdNm, ADM.frontExporeNm, ADM.FNLLGNDATE, ADM.PWCHGDATE, ADM.secpswd, ADM.secpswd_1, ADM.secpswd_2 FROM NADM01MT ADM LEFT JOIN NCOD01MT COD ON ( ADM.GRPCd=COD.Cd ) WHERE UPPER(ADM.SysopId) = UPPER(#id#);
